thread.title: OSU's Meyer recaps Penn State, previews Rutgers

title: OSU's Meyer recaps Penn State, previews Rutgers
text:
OSU's Meyer recaps Penn State, previews Rutgers 
Updated: Mon, Oct 19 2015, 04:41 PM 
COLUMBUS (WKRC) -- Top-ranked Ohio State seeks a 21st consecutive victory when it takes on Rutgers Saturday. Saturday is the second meeting between the two schools after Ohio State won the first meeting in 2014, 56-17, in Columbus.Ohio State has won 27 Big Ten regular season games in a row, going 8-0 in each of the past three seasons and 3-0 this year. The streak is a Big Ten record. Ohio State leads the conference in scoring (37.0) and rushing (242.1). Buckeyes head coach Urban Meyer met with the media to discuss the matchup on Saturday. He also looked back on the 38-10 win against Penn State. Related Stories
